alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Haakon and southeastern Ziebach Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8, or 18 miles south of Eagle Butte. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Haakon and southeastern Ziebach Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
